title: Chicken Salad With Thai Flavored Dressing

content.text: 4 cups rotisserie chicken, skinned and boned, meat shredded into bite-sized pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "4 cups rotisserie chicken, skinned and boned, meat shredded into bite-sized pieces" )

content.text: 2 medium celery ribs, cut into small dice
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 medium celery ribs, cut into small dice" )
( ing-2 "2 medium green onions, sliced thin" )
( ing-8 "1/2 teaspoon hot red pepper flakes" )
( ing-9 "2 tablespoons minced fresh cilantro leaves" )
( ing-10 "2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint leaves" )

content.text: 0) In a medium bowl, mix chicken, celery, green onions and peanuts.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chicken"@25:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "celery"@34:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "green onions"@42:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "peanuts"@59:66 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a small bowl, whisk lime juice, fish sauce, ginger, sugar, red pepper, cilantro and mint, plus 2 Tbs. water.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "whisk"@20:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "lime juice"@26:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "fish sauce"@38:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "ginger"@50:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "sugar"@58:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "red pepper"@65:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cilantro"@77:85 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "mint"@90:94 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "2 Tbs. water"@101:113 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Toss dressing with chicken mixture and serve on a bed of Boston lettuce with the suggested accompaniments.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Toss"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "dressing"@8:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "chicken mixture"@22:37 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "serve"@42:47 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "a bed of Boston lettuce"@51:74 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the suggested accompaniments"@80:108 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-12 )
			:ref ( ing-13 )
			:ref ( ing-14 )
		)
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
